channel.title: Latest PHMSA Hazardous Materials Incident Reports, for DE
channel.description: The latest Form 5800.1 hazardous material reports submitted to the Department of Transportation and posted online by the Pipeline and Hazardous Materials Safety Administration, for DE

item.title: Report E-2023090514
item.description:
Report E-2023090514

Identified by scraper @ 2023-09-21T15:10:31+00:00

  • Incident Date: 2023-09-11
  • City: SEAFORD
  • State: DE
  • Report Type: A hazardous material incident
  • Mode Of Transportation: Highway
  • Carrier/Reporter: XPO LOGISTICS, LLC
  • Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Hazmat Injuries: 0
  • Non-Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Description: XPO Logistics terminal XSA experienced a UN1760 Clothesline Fresh BLD 2 release from (6) 5-gallon poly pails. ERTS dispatched contractors to conduct cleanup. Contractors arrived confirmed approximately 20-gallons of material released to an 8’ x 15’ area of the trailer floor and a 10’ x 4’ area of the concrete lot below due to improper loading; the pallet tipped over in transit. The impacted areas were cleaned with absorbents and neutralized with 30% vinegar solution. All impacted absorbents and the damaged pails were collected and containerized into (3) 55-gallon poly drums. All waste was staged onsite for terminal personnel to manage.
